sqlMap.update: UPDATE PDF_E102Y SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , PNSN_SV_SEIL_NUM=#pnsnSvSeilNum# , FORM_CD=#formCd# , RESID=#resid# , NAME=#name# , DAT_CD=#datCd# , BUSNID=#busnid# , TRADE_NM=#tradeNm# , COM_CD=#comCd# , ANN_TOT_AMT=#annTotAmt# , TAX_YEAR_AMT=#taxYearAmt# , DDCT_BS_ASS_AMT=#ddctBsAssAmt# , PNSN_SV_SUM=#pnsnSvSum# , PDF_DAT_APP_YN=#pdfDatAppYn# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PNSN_SV_SEIL_NUM=#pnsnSvSeilNum#

UPDATE PDF_E102Y SET PDF_DAT_APP_YN=#pdfDatAppYn# , PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT = SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'),0,8) , PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT = #pdfDatAppExcCtnt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PNSN_SV_SEIL_NUM=#pnsnSvSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PDF_E102Y WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PNSN_SV_SEIL_NUM=#pnsnSvSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PNSN_SV_SEIL_NUM , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , DAT_CD , BUSNID , TRADE_NM , COM_CD , ANN_TOT_AMT , TAX_YEAR_AMT , DDCT_BS_ASS_AMT , PNSN_SV_SUM , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT , PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_E102Y WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PNSN_SV_SEIL_NUM=#pnsnSvSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PNSN_SV_SEIL_NUM , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , DAT_CD , BUSNID , TRADE_NM , COM_CD , ANN_TOT_AMT , TAX_YEAR_AMT , DDCT_BS_ASS_AMT , ISA_ANN_TOT_AMT , ISA_TAX_YEAR_AMT , ISA_DDCT_BS_ASS_AMT , PNSN_SV_SUM , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT , PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_E102Y WHERE 1=1 AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , PNSN_SV_SEIL_NUM ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PDF_E102Y WHERE 1=1 AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
